item.title: Stable Diffusion Scripts
item.description: Data Grooming Numbering PNG files in a folder in sequence 1import os 2import pathlib 3 4collection = os.getcwd() 5#print(collection) 6for i, filename in enumerate(os.listdir(collection)): 7 file_extension = pathlib.Path(filename).suffix 8 #print("File Extension: ", file_extension) 9 if(file_extension == ".png"): 10 os.rename(collection +"\\"+ filename, collection +"\\"+ str(i).zfill(4) + ".png") This code block is a Python script that does the following: Imports the os and pathlib modules. Defines a variable collection which is set to the current working directory.
